None.Name: Gifted Bow Attack
None.Description: Every 2.5 seconds, unit fires arrows at enemies that deal 4 damage. The arrows are embittered with a strong toxic substance that severely poisons a targeted unit and slowly decreases its life points by 30 per second. Lasts for 10 seconds.
